data.name: BOT re logwood
data.desc: Board of Trade territorial claims to logwood districts are untenable and orders Gov of Jam to discourage logging
data.note:
1677 Armada de Barlovento campaign against loggers in Laguna de Terminos /v Botella-Ordinas 147 /
 See *Acts of the Privy Council of England, Colonial Series*, 6 vols [Hereford and Lon, sn, 1908-1912], vol 1 pp 814, 835 / [missg] CSPC [missg] [vol for years 1677-1680, nos or pp 343, 346, 364-365] / [missg] CSPC [missg] [vol for yrs 1681-1685, no or p 284] /v Socolow 481
